packageRepo.readme:
# Espanso French Politeness Package

Improve your French communication experience using these snippet triggers.
A package of the most common and important French expressions.
Become more respectful in daily interactions.

## Installation

This package can be installed using the Espanso package manager:

```bash
espanso install french-politeness
```

## Usage

Type any trigger and it will be automatically replaced with the corresponding French expression. Most triggers support case propagation, meaning that if you type the trigger in uppercase, the replacement will also be in uppercase.

## Triggers

### Opening Expressions

| Trigger | Replacement | Notes |
| ------- | ----------- | ----- |
| bjr | bonjour | Case-sensitive (Bjr → Bonjour) |
| bapm | bonne après-midi | Case-sensitive (Bapm → Bonne après-midi) |
| bsr | bonsoir | Case-sensitive (Bsr → Bonsoir) |
| msr, m. | monsieur, | Case-sensitive (Mr → Monsieur,) |
| mme, mme. | madame, | Case-sensitive (Mme → Madame,) |
| mlle | mademoiselle, | Case-sensitive (Mlle → Mademoiselle,) |
| :cher | [[dear]] [[name]], | Interactive form (dear: Cher/Chère) |
| :alattde | À l'attention de [[name]], | Interactive form |
| slt | salut, | Case-sensitive (Slt → Salut,) |
| cc | coucou, | Case-sensitive (Cc → Coucou,) |
| jqtb | J'espère que tu vas bien | |
| jqvb | J'espère que vous allez bien | |

### Closure Expressions

| Trigger | Replacement |
| ------- | ----------- |
| bat | Bien à toi, |
| bav | Bien à vous, |
| cdt | Cordialement, |
| sltd | Salutations distinguées, |
| eslt | En vous adressant mes salutations distinguées, |
| aslt | Avec l'expression de mes salutations distinguées, |
| rsp | Respectueusement, |
| scr | Sincèrement, |
| sslt | Sincères salutations, |
| amslt | Avec mes meilleures salutations, |
| mpat | Merci pour votre attention, |
| attret | Dans l'attente de votre retour, |

## Features

- **Case Propagation**: Most triggers support automatic case propagation. Type "Bjr" to get "Bonjour" or "bjr" to get "bonjour".
- **Word Boundary Detection**: Triggers only activate when typed as complete words, preventing unwanted replacements.
- **Interactive Forms**: Some triggers like `:cher` and `:alattde` open interactive forms to customize the output.
---

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# espanso configuration file

# This is the default configuration file, change it as you like it
# You can refer to the official documentation:
# https://espanso.org/docs/

# Matches are the substitution rules, when you type the "trigger" string
# it gets replaced by the "replace" string.
name: french-politeness
parent: default

matches:
  ### ----------------
  ### Opening expressions
  ### ----------------

  - trigger: "bjr"
    replace: "bonjour"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - trigger: "bapm"
    replace: "bonne après-midi"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - trigger: "bsr"
    replace: "bonsoir"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - triggers:
      - "msr"
      - "m."
    replace: "monsieur,"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - triggers:
      - "mme"
      - "mme."
    replace: "madame,"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - trigger: "mlle"
    replace: "mademoiselle,"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - trigger: ":cher"
    form: |
      [[dear]] [[name]],
    form_fields:
      dear:
        type: choice
        values:
          - Cher
          - Chère
      name:
        type: text
        multiline: false
  - trigger: ":alattde"
    form: |
      À l’attention de [[name]],
    form_fields:
      name:
        type: text
        multiline: false
  - trigger: "slt"
    replace: "salut,"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - trigger: "cc"
    replace: "coucou,"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
  - trigger: "jqtb"
    replace: "J'espère que tu vas bien"
    word: true
  - trigger: "jqvb"
    replace: "J'espère que vous allez bien"
    word: true

  ### ----------------
  ### Closure expressions
  ### ----------------

  - trigger: "bat"
    replace: "Bien à toi,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "bav"
    replace: "Bien à vous,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "cdt"
    replace: "Cordialement,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "sltd"
    replace: "Salutations distinguées,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "eslt"
    replace: "En vous adressant mes salutations distinguées,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "aslt"
    replace: "Avec l'expression de mes salutations distinguées,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "rsp"
    replace: "Respectueusement,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "scr"
    replace: "Sincèrement,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "sslt"
    replace: "Sincères salutations,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "amslt"
    replace: "Avec mes meilleures salutations,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "mpat"
    replace: "Merci pour votre attention,"
    word: true
  - trigger: "attret"
    replace: "Dans l'attente de votre retour,"
    word: true
